testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name and last name.....................................passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email........................................................passed And user fills Password fields..............................................passed Then user clicks on register button.........................................passed And success message is displayed............................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with valid data.............................................passed Then user click on login button.............................................passed And user login to the system successfully...................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
